item.title: Race to the rock
item.description: Race to the rock data analysis Data are available from the map progress website for race to the rock 2018. Table 1 shows how the format of the data straight from the map progress website. I offer the following visualisations as yet another tid-bit to add to the race-to-the-rock soup. Table 1: Data come out looking like this Number Name Time Unix Seconds Latitude Longitude Distance (metres) Elevation (metres) Message Type Message Detail Source Time Zone 1 Adam Lana 2018-09-01 06:32:29 1535747549 -43.
